alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:28PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Benton and northern Iowa Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belle Plaine, or 10 miles southeast of Toledo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Plaine, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Keystone, Norway, Luzerne, Hannen Lake Park, Watkins and Koszta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
